page_content:
Nine23Ltd

Content Management System - Venture

Venture CMS provides secure access to your data from any device. The data can be documents, maps, media or bespoke. Data can be role or hierarchical schemed with a full audit of usage. The workflow engine is templated or can be customized.

Features

  • Assured Content Management System.
  • Mobile devices are able to access data held centrally.
  • Users are able to complete and submit forms.
  • Users are able to annotate content.
  • Available to multiple platforms and mobile ready.
  • Scalable architecture.
  • Control of access is handled centrally.
  • Full reporting on usage and content effectiveness.
  • Customise and secure sensitive data with extra authentication.
  • Host and connect with MMaaS at OFFICIAL SENSITIVE.

Benefits

  • Delivers sensitive, business critical content to end-users.
  • Share critical data flows with collaborative groups.
  • A wide variety of content types/media can be viewed.
  • Remote updating of documentation.
  • Workflows, updating and versioning are handled automatically.
  • Version reporting and recording available to administrator.
  • Legacy system compatible saving time and money on content.
  • On-line and off-line usage for operational use in isolated environments.

Pricing

£4 per device per month

  • Excluding VAT
  • Minimum contract period: Month
